mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mgm_board where board_name = #{board_name}
mapper.insert: insert into mgm_board(board_seq,board_group,board_title,board_contents,board_writer,board_readcount,board_regdate, board_delflag,board_recommender,board_pushnum, board_name) select case count(*) when 0 then 1 else max(board_seq) + 1 end , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(board_group) + 1, 1) FROM mgm_board b where board_name=#{board_name}),#{board_title},#{board_contents},#{board_writer},0,now(),'N','null',0,#{board_name} from mgm_board
mapper.update: UPDATE mgm_board SET board_readcount = board_readcount+1 WHERE board_seq=#{board_seq}
UPDATE mgm_board SET board_delflag = 'Y' where board_seq = #{board_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from mgm_board where board_recommender like CONCAT('%', #{member_id}, '%') and board_seq=#{board_seq}

SELECT board_seq,board_title,board_writer, board_regdate,board_delflag,board_name,(select count(*) from mgm_comment where comment_group = board_group)AS board_replyCnt FROM mgm_board ORDER BY board_pushnum DESC ,board_readcount limit 12
